div.p: We are currently seeking a dynamic person with experience in the hotel industry to join our team in Senegal. Sales experience is preferable but not a must if you are willing to learn and you have contacts in the hotel industry within the country. You will be joining our growing global sales team presenting the HRS wide portfolio of products to hospitality related companies across Senegal.

ul.li: Niveau d´études requis : Bac+1, Bac+2, Bac+3, Bac+4 & Bac+5 et plus
Niveau d'expérience : Expérience entre 2 ans et 5 ans et plus
